name: Blue Slaad
lore: Blue slaadi are burly, thick-skinned brutes spawned from Humanoids infected with slaad tadpoles. They slash foes with lightning-wreathed claws and implant eggs in Humanoid victims, perpetuating their bizarre reproductive cycle. These creatures revel in chaos and destruction, rampaging through the multiverse wherever rifts from Limbo spill open.
resistances: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, and Thunder

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The slaad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The slaad regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

multiattack.description: The slaad makes three Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Lightning damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become a slaad tadpole host (see the "Slaad Tadpole Host" sidebar).

onFailure.effects: The target becomes a slaad tadpole host. A Humanoid host shows no symptoms for 2d12 hours, after which a Slaad Tadpole bursts from the host, killing it. A Lesser Restoration spell or similar magic cast on the host can destroy the implanted egg.
